content.query:
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [silver].[patients]
(
	 [Id] VARCHAR(64)
)
WITH
(
	LOCATION = '/patients/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = [Silver],
	FILE_FORMAT = [DELTA]
)

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [silver].[encounters]
(
	 [Id] VARCHAR(64)
)
WITH
(
	LOCATION = '/encounters/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = [Silver],
	FILE_FORMAT = [DELTA]
)
